loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: John Fredy

texts.es:
Él es John es un hombre sonriente, trabajador, liberar, honesto, sincero, tiene 34 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto con su hija de 7 años la cual protege y vela porque tengan las herramientas necesarias para formarse como una buena persona, como lo son alimentación, educación, vivienda y vestimenta.
John tiene un taller de moto, donde ofrece empleo a una persona, junto con sus servicios ofrece la venta de aceite para el cambio que hay que hacer cada periodo de tiempo a un vehículo, con su negocio se proyecta poder comprar una vivienda propia, un esfuerzo gigante que se verá quizás en varios años pero que quiere materializar sea que la pague de contado o ir pagándola por cuotas, también aspira a tener un negocio sostenible en el tiempo pues al pasar 10 años su hija podría estar en la universidad y quiere brindarle esa posibilidad.
Como son tantos los proyectos que aspira a ejecutar necesita darle un impulso a su negocio para que este sea lo suficiente para poder generar ganancias y cumplir con todos estos ambiciosos proyectos, solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos y aceites para motocicletas.
texts.en:
This is John, a cheerful, hard-working, honest, sincere man. He's 34 years old, single and lives with his 7 year old daughter who he protects and looks after so that she can have the necessary tools to grow up to be a good person, such as: nutrition, education, a home, and clothing.
John has a motorcycle workshop, where he employs one person. Along with these services he sells oil for the periodic oil changes that vehicles need. With his business he aims to buy a home of his own, a giant undertaking that will maybe become a reality in several years but it's something he wants to do whether he has to pay cash or installments. He also aspires to have a sustainable business in the long-term since in 10 years time his daughter could be in college and he wants to make that a possibility for her.
Since the goals he wants to achieve are so many he needs to give his business a boost so that it can do well enough to generate profit and achieve all of these ambitious goals. He's requesting a loan to buy spare parts for motorcycles and oils.

loans.use: To buy motorcyle parts and oils.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase an assortment of ice cream flavors, display cases, and shelves.

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.es:
Jean Pierre tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de Cayaltí una comunidad que se encuentra ubicado sobre el valle de Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, desde hace más de cinco años, trasladando a sus pasajeros a los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, cuenta con experiencia en este sector y con clientes fijos quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Ha solicitado un préstamo para realizar reparaciones y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, y así seguir brindando el servicio de manera segura, generando mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Jena Pierre is 30 years old and lives with his wife and son in the Cayaltí district, a community located in the Zaña valley, where the people work mainly in farming, raising cattle, and trade. Zaña is in the province of Chiclayo, on Peru’s northern coast.

Jean Pierre provides public transport services in the motorcycle taxi that he has owned for five years. He takes his passengers to neighbouring villages. He has experience in the sector, and regular customers who provide good personal and professional references.

Jean Pierre is applying for a loan in order to repair and maintain his vehicle, which is currently not in very good condition. This loan will allow Jean-Pierre to continue providing a safe and secure service, generating an income for his family and improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his vehicle, which is currently not in very good condition.

loans.name: Francisco De Paula

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 65 años de edad, casado, padre de un hombre ya mayor de edad y con una actividad económica poco vista entre las historias montadas por el socio de campo INTERACTUAR, la cual es la cría de perros una actividad que aprendió solo y que nació de la necesidad por generar recursos para mantener a su familia y hoy pasado más de 15 años se ha convertido en su medio de sostenimiento y de mejora de calidad de vida. 
Inicio esta actividad también debido a una incapacidad que lo privo de realizar mucho esfuerzo físico, pero a pesar de este impedimento medico sigue en pie de lucha, buscando atraer clientes, incrementar su utilidad y diversificar su oferta al público.
Con la ayuda de un préstamo francisco quiere comprar machos para aparearlos con sus hembras.
Apoya a esta persona limitada medicamente pero que demuestra cada día que tiene más ánimos que cualquier persona sana
texts.en:
Francisco is 65 years old, married, and a father to one grown son. Francisco has a business that is not often seen at Interactuar, which is raising dogs. He learned this trade on his own as he needed to earn an income to support his family. Francisco has now spent more than 15 years doing this work. It allows him to support his family and improve their quality of life.

Francsico also started this work owing to a physical disability that stopped him from doing work that required a lot of physical effort. While this medical condition has impeded him in some ways, it has not stopped Francisco from working hard, looking for customers and ways to increase profits, and from diversifying the products he offers to customers.

Francisco will use this loan to buy male dogs to mate with his female dogs.

Support Francisco! Although physically disabled, he proves every day that he is just as motivated as any healthy person.

loans.use: to buy male dogs to pair with his female dogs at his pet store.

loans.name: Bladismir

texts.es:
Blasdismir es un ingenioso, creativo, recursivo empresario de 36 años de edad que se dedica a la fabricación de productos para el aseo, actividad que aprendió cuando era empleado de una empresa.
 Su hijo de 6 años le genera todas las energías para salir adelante, en él encuentra toda la motivación para superarse como persona y empresario buscando generarle un mejor futuro.
Su mayor ventaja es que es la única empresa en el sector que ofrece este servicio y al ser sus productos artesanales y de excelente calidad los piden mucho sus vecinos.
Blasdismir tiene sueños, propósitos uno de ellos es pagar la educación de su hijo, crecer como empresa, ofrecer empleo, notarse en el mercado y sostenerse en el tiempo.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de químicos, con los que fabrica sus productos que sirven para limpiar pisos, baños, y todo lo relacionado con el hogar.
texts.en:
At 36 years old, Blasdismir is a creative, clever and creative businessman. He makes a living producing cleaning products, a trade he learned when he was working for another business.

Blasdismir’s six-year-old son provides him with all the energy he needs to get ahead and he is motivated to do better and go in search of a better future.

One advantage Blasdismir has is that his business is unique in the local area. Producing handmade, good quality products, his items are popular with neighbours.

Blasdismir dreams of paying for his son’s education, of expanding his business and offering jobs. He wants to open a stall at the market and make the business sustainable.

Blasdismir is applying for a loan in order to make products for cleaning floors, bathrooms, and other household areas.

loans.use: to buy chemicals for producing cleaning products.

loans.name: Daniel Antonio

texts.es:
Daniel es un veterano de 72 años de edad, un hombre que ha recorrido gran trayectoria de su vida, toda su vida fue empleado informal, por lo que no alcanzo a cotizar en una pensión. Es un hombre casado de su matrimonio nacieron 4 hijos y ahora en su nueva faceta de trabajo la cual es vendedor de abarrotes, empleo esta actividad para tener una entrada de dinero que le permitiera traer alimento a su hogar.
Daniel aspira a tener un resto de vejez tranquila, disfrutar de buenos momentos junto con su familia y vecinos por eso valora tanto su tienda.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de abarrotes, snack, confitería, chocolates, para abastecer su tienda y tener surtido para soportar unos meses para juntar dinero tanto para el pago del crédito, como mantener su hogar.
texts.en:
Daniel is 72 years old and a veteran. His life has taken him down a long path, always working on the informal job market. As a result of this, he was unable to pay in to a pension fund. Daniel is married and has four children. He now has a business selling groceries, having taken on this work in order to bring in an income to feed his household.

Daniel aspires to having a peaceful old age. He wants to enjoy the good moment with his family and neighbours, and so values his shop.

Daniel is applying for a loan in order to buy groceries, snacks, sweets and chocolates to stock up his shop. He wants to have stock to last a few months in order to save up enough money both to pay off his loan and to support his household.

loans.use: to buy groceries, snacks, sweets and chocolates to stock up his shop.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita is married and she has 2 children. 

She is a business woman and she is requesting a loan of 800 USD from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her business. She became involved in business activities a few years ago with her own working capital of 1,500 USD, and she has done her best with it. She has a lot of interest in doing business. She now has a bigger store but she still wants to improve her management of the business. 

She has taken out a loan from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional items to keep in her store like cooking oils, sugar, shampoo, sardines, notebooks, noodles, biscuits, cigarettes, pens and other things to sell, including soft and alcoholic drinks.

loans.use: To buy cooking oils, sugar, shampoo, sardines, notebooks, noodles, biscuits, cigarettes, pens and other things to sell, including soft and alcoholic drinks

loans.name: Oscar Mario

texts.es: Oscar Mario, tiene la edad  de 21 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de una vaca con buenas condiciones para la producción de leche y a la vez que tenga buenas características en la crianza de terneros que a futuro poder vender para el engorde. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de pasto y aprovechar esta época de verano que es mejor para el desarrollo de los animales y también  las buenas condiciones de terreno, agua potable y clima para poder este animal y que los terneros tengan un rápido aumento en desarrollo y ganancia de carne carne. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Oscar Mario, 21, is single and lives with his parents and siblings who are his greatest priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy a strong dairy cow to produce milk and raise calves to sell in the future.  His idea is to take advantage of the pasture area he has and the summer season which is the best for animal development.  The good earth, drinking water and climate also are beneficial for the cattle's development.

With this purchase Oscar Mario will be able to work in another activity as well as save money to buy more animals and property.  This is his first loan through FUDECOSUR.  He has never received a state bank loan but FUDECOSUR is giving him better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Nataly

texts.es:
Nataly, a sus 27 años de edad, es una mujer carismática, activa y servicial, busca alternativas para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a sus hijos. 

Desde hace aproximadamente 1 año, comenzó a comercializar calzado para todo tipo de clientes, de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, lo que le permitió darse a conocer en el sector y lograr una buena trayectoria. 
Trabaja todos los días.

Esto la impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer sus inventarios, pues comprará calzado al por mayor, así podrá satisfacer la demanda que aumenta en esta temporada de entrada al colegio, esto le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. 

Nataly manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir haciendo lo que le apasiona, por ello siempre se propone nuevas metas y entre ellas está el de convertirse en una gran distribuidora de calzado y generar oportunidades de empleo, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida y el bienestar tanto de su familia, como la de aquellas personas que le ayuden a realizar su labor diaria.
  
Anímate a prestar al negocio de Nataly!
texts.en:
Nataly, 27, is a charismatic, active, service-oriented woman who looks for different ways to earn a living to support her children.

Around a year ago she started selling quality, low-priced shoes to different customers, which allowed her to get established in the market and achieve a good standing.  She works every day.

This has motivated her to request a loan to strengthen her inventory.  She will buy shoes wholesale in order to satisfy the growing demand this season when school starts.  This will help improve the income she earns through her work.

Nataly says her age does not keep her from doing what she loves, so she is always setting new goals.  One of them is to become a large shoe distributor and generate employment so she can improve her family's quality of life and well-being, as well as that of the people who help in her daily work.

Let's help Nataly with her business!

loans.use: To buy shoes wholesale for this season.

loans.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Librada está en el ciclo número 3 del programa de Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, donde todas forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza que les permitirá conocer su situación, y conforme a ello poder trabajar por mejorar..
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Yolanda, Directora del Comité, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado bastante. Ella tiene un pequeño copetín que formo con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio y con ello mantiene a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella se esmera para poder tener cada dia algo mejor que ofrecer a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar golosinas, comestibles, jugos, gaseosas y demás para poder surtir su copetín.
texts.en:
The communal bank Santa Librada is in its third loan cycle through the Women Entrepreneurs Committee where they are participating in a poverty elimination program to make them aware of their situation and work toward improving it.

One of the members is Yolanda, the director of the group.  On the last survey she showed a level three of poverty, which means she has improved considerably.  She has a small snack bar that she established with much effort and sacrifice to support her family and loved ones.  She does all she can to offer the best she can to her family every day.

She is requesting the loan to buy sweets, groceries, juices, sodas and other goods for her business.

loans.use: To buy sweets, groceries, juices, sodas and other goods.

loans.name: Maria Silvia

texts.es: Maria de 51 años de edad se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas, etc.  su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar,  vive en casa propia con su esposo,  la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar más productos por mayor, ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podrá obtener mejores ganancias y podrá tener junto con su esposo un mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 51, sells all kinds of personal care items such as lotions, deodorants, perfumes, creams, etc.  She runs her business from home and uses the profit from sales to help her husband cover household expenses.  She and her husband live in their own home.

Maria wants to expand her business and is requesting a loan to buy more products wholesale since she has many customers and wants to offer them good prices.  This way she will be able to earn more and enjoy a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: To buy lotions, deodorants, perfumes, creams, etc.

loans.name: Vilma Ruth

texts.es: Vilma de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijas. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia donde confecciona diferentes tipos de prendas, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque el trabajo que ella realiza es excelente y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles; ella es una mujer muy dedicada a su trabajo responsable y honesta, Vilma esta solicitando un crédito que le permita comprar: telas, hilos, agujas, y todo lo relacionado con la costura para seguir satisfaciendo la necesidad de los clientes y así  podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Vilma, 43, lives in her own house with her husband and two daughters.  She has a sewing shop set up at home where she makes all kinds of clothing.  Recently she has attracted many customers because of her excellent work and affordable prices.  She is very dedicated, hard-working, responsible and honest.

Vilma is requesting a loan to buy fabrics, thread, needles and all kinds of sewing supplies to continue satisfying her customers.  This is so she can enjoy a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, thread, needles and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabet

texts.es: Sandra de 38 años de edad vive junto a su esposo, sus dos hijos y su sobrina, ella es una mujer muy responsable quien siempre está en miras de mejorar su estabilidad económica. Ella trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan francés, el cual elabora junto con su familia a primeras horas de la madrugada para poder venderlo antes del desayuno, que es cuando las personas más lo consumen al igual que en la cena. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con la ayuda necesaria para invertir en la compra de harina, levadura, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra is 38 years old and lives with her husband, her two children, and her niece. She is a very responsible woman who always has her sights set on improving her economic stability. 

She works in her own bakery, where she makes pan francés (a type of baguette). She makes pan francés with her family in the early hours of the morning so that they can be sold before breakfast, which is when most people eat them (as well as at dinner).

She is asking for a loan from INTEGRAL in order to have the support necessary to buy flour, yeast, butter, tins, and everything needed to produce more bread. This project of improving her bakery is very important for her, and she says that in this way she will improve her quality of life, and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, butter, tins, and everything necessary.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy French bread to sell.

loans.name: Maria Nicolasa

texts.es: Maria de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, ella se dedica desde hace 8 años a la venta de comida y antojitos, su negocio está ubicado cerca de su casa en una zona muy transitada, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de materia prima como: carnes, pollos, arroz, verduras, refrescos, etc. todo por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 54 years old and lives in her own house with her sister. She has been selling food and traditional corn-based snacks such as tamales for 8 years. Maria’s business is located in a busy area near her home, and she manages to get by with what she earns from her sales.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy wholesale raw food produce such as meat, chickens, rice, vegetables and soft drinks etc. so that she can continue her work and thus have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale meat, chickens, rice, vegetables, soft drinks etc.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es: Agustina de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, ella posee desde hace 10 años un negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la variedad de productos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas sopas, refrescos, azúcar, granos básicos, café, gaseosas, etc. todo por mayor par poder continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener una mejor calidad de  ida junto con su familia.
texts.en: Agustina, 46 years old, lives in her own house with her life partner and their three children. For the past 10 years she has had a business selling basic pantry items. She has many customers due to her good prices and the variety of products. With what she earns from her sales, she manages to pay the expenses that come up in her household. She is asking for another loan to purchase more soup, drinks, sugar, basic grains, coffee, soft drinks, etc., all in bulk to be able to continue with her sales an din this way have a better quality of life with her family.

loans.use: to purchase more soup, drinks, sugar, basic grains, coffee, soft drinks, etc., all in bulk.

loans.name: Los Retonos Group

texts.es:
Yolanda es una mujer de 33 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 5 hijos de 18, 15, 9, 6 y 4 años, y su negocio es la venta de repuestos para movilidades.
Ella es buena madre, emprendedora, activa, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en el barrio ‘Los retoños’, un lugar caracterizado por la multiculturalidad de sus pobladores provenientes en su mayoría de poblaciones de occidente y algunas etnias cercanas que emigraron a la ciudad, De clima cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-35 grados centígrados.
Yolanda es de tez morena, baja estatura, ojos obscuros, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado estilo cola de caballo, complexión física robusta, su lengua materna es el Ayoreo que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza (a la izquierda lleva vestido celeste y marrón). Su vida la comparte con su pareja que se dedica al transporte y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela y ayudan en el negocio. Su deseos por satisfacer las necesidades de su familia la llevaron a liderar una banca de personas con negocios como; venta de empanadas, venta de refrescos, venta de cosméticos por catálogo, venta de verduras, atención de salón de té, pintado de uñas, venta de pescado y bicicletería, para solicitar un préstamo y cumplir sus objetivos. Su negocio es la venta de repuestos para movilidades como; accesorios, limpiaparabrisas, espejo retrovisor, bujías, stop’s, faroles, etc., en un puesto de venta fijo al aire libre de lunes a domingo en horario diurno. “vendo todos aquellos repuestos baratos que se rompen constantemente y que no ocasionan una gran pérdida ni son caros, por eso tengo clientes constantes que compran repuestos para talleres mecánicos y otros clientes particulares…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una tienda de repuestos propia y bajo techo, ella desea realizar la compra de variedad de repuestos para automóvil y así surtir su negocio y aumentar la oferta. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 8 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad de manera independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Yolanda solicita un préstamo para la compra de variedad de repuestos de automóvil para surtir su tienda y mejorar su oferta.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a 33-year-old woman, she lives with her partner, has 5 children ages 18, 15, 9, 6, and 4 years old, and her business is selling spare parts for vehicles. 

She is a good mother, enterprising, active, dependable, responsible, and hard-working. Her business is located in Los retoños neighborhood, a place characterized by the multicultural population, coming mostly from the populations in the west and some ethnicities nearby who emigrated to the city. It has a warm climate, tropical and humid, with a temperature that varies during the day between 21-35 degrees centigrade. 

Yolanda has dark skin, is short, has dark eyes, long black hair that she keeps tied in a ponytail, has a robust physique, her native language is Ayoreo, which she speaks with her family, and she speaks Spanish due to the general culture and for business she does (she is on the left and is wearing a blue and brown dress). She shares her life with her partner who works in transportation and with her children who go to school and help in the business. Her desires to satisfy her family's needs led her to lead a bank of people with businesses such as empanada sales, soft drink sales, cosmetics sales from a catalog, vegetable sales, serving a tea salon, polishing nails, fish sales, and a bicycle shop, to ask for a loan and realize her goals. Her business is selling vehicle parts such as accessories, windshield wipers, rear view mirrors, spark plugs, taillights, headlights, etc., in a permanent, open-air sales space from Monday to Sunday during the day. "I sell all of the cheap parts that break constantly and that don't cause a huge loss and aren't expensive, so I have regular customers who buy parts for mechanic shops and other individual customers..." she says. Her dream is to have her own, indoor, spare parts store. She wants to purchase a variety of car parts and in this way stock her business and expand her offerings. This is her first loan cycle with the institution in the 8 years that she has been doing this work independently. 

For these reasons, Yolanda asks for a loan to purchase a variety of car parts to stock her store and improve her offerings.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of car parts to stock her store and improve her offerings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more coconuts in bulk

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna, 47, is married and has four children. 

Lorna is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Lorna has been raising pigs for two years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase sweet breads, French bread, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
El comité está conformado por 20 señoras que apuntan a una mejor y buena calidad de vida, es por ello que se unieron con la esperanza de procurar un mejor porvenir para sus seres queridos, y que no pasen por necesidades como las que ellas tuvieron que pasar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Griselda, madre de 2 hijos menores, casada con el señor Jorge, ella es comerciante de comidas rápidas, tiene su puesto de ventas en la esquina de una plaza, cabe resaltar que la señora es muy activa en su comité.
Ella está luchando y se esfuerza por poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus seres queridos. Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas rápidas, como ser verduras, carne, hortalizas y otros.
Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The committee is made up of 20 woman who want a better and good quality of life. For this reason, they join together with the hope of getting a better future for their loved ones, so they don't have any deprivations like the ones they had to go through.

One of the members is Griselda, mother of 2 young children, married to Jorge. She is a fast food vendor, she has her sales stall at the corner of a plaza, and, notably, she is very active in her committee. 

She struggles and works hard to be able to get ahead and help her loved ones. She asks for this loan to purchase supplies to be able to make her fast food such as vegetables, meat, and more. 

She is grateful for the opportunity that she is getting to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, and more.

loans.name: Vitelio

texts.es: Vitelio de 38 años de edad habita junto a su compañera de vida en casa propia. Vitelio es un hombre emprendedor quien hace todo lo que este a su alcance por llevar el sustento diario a su hogar, el se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de dulces de manera ambulante por los diferentes mercados, el desea invertir en su negocio de dulces ya que es la única fuente de ingresos que posee. Por esa razón solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de variedad de dulces para la venta y así cubrir una mayor demanda de mercado y poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Vitelio is 38 years old and lives in his own house with his partner. He is an enterprising man who does everything in his power to provide daily support for his household. 

Vitelio makes a living selling sweets as a street vendor at various markets and has been doing this for a few years. He hopes to invest in his sweets business as it is the only source of income he has. For this reason, Vitelio is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in the purchase of an assortment of sweets for sale so he can meet a greater demand in the market and in turn increase his income.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of wholesale sweets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bedroom for her children.

loans.name: Amparo Victoria

texts.es: Amparo vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce desde hace 10 años  anda su mercadería en un  carretón que utiliza para desplazarse por los diferentes mercados y tiene muchos clientes, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pan dulce por mayor para continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Amparo lives in her own home with her family group. She's worked for ten years selling pan dulce [sweet bread]. 

She uses a cart to carry her merchandise through the different markets. She has many clients, and with the income from the sales she is able to meet some of her household expenses.

Amparo is requesting the loan to buy more pan dulce at wholesale in order to continue selling and get better income.

loans.use: to buy more pan dulce at wholesale.

loans.name: Omar Adrian

texts.es:
Omar es un hombre joven de 18 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de derecho.
Él es inteligente, despierto, atento, alegre, feliz, responsable y buen estudiante. Sus estudios los desarrolla en la universidad pública en la carrera de derecho, caracterizada por encontrarse en el centro al lado de restaurantes, oficinas, empresas y todo tipo de comercio, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-16 grados centígrados.
Omar es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla sólo con sus abuelos porque estudia inglés y habla español porque estudia en la universidad. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Él estudia la carrera de derecho en primer año, y se prepara para manejar las leyes y normativas legales en todo campo. “tengo el ideal de ayudar a las personas a realizar trámites judiciales, contratos, uniones, todo aquello donde se necesite el reconocimiento de firmas y tenga valor legal…” comenta. Su sueño es terminar su carrea y trabajar en un estudio jurídico, él desea realizar la compra de libros y pagar todo tipo de material necesario para comenzar sus estudios sin inconvenientes. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en su 1 año de estudios en la universidad.
Es por esos motivos que Omar solicita un préstamo para la compra de libros, pago de fotocopias y para comenzar sin inconvenientes el primer año de universidad.
texts.en:
Omar is a young man of 18 years of age who is single and with no kids. He studies law.

He is intelligent, awake, attentive, cheerful, happy, responsible and a good student. His studies are carried out in the public university in the study of law, characterized by being in the center next to restaurants, offices, businesses and all kinds of trade. He lives in a cold and dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 2-16 degrees Celsius.

Omar is of dark complexion, with short black hair, dark eyes, and a thin physique. His mother tongue is Aymará which he speaks only with his grandparents because he is studying English and Spanish in the university. He shares his life with his parents who works. They live in a home built with brick and a tin roof, that has potable water, electricity and sewage. He is studying law in his first year, and is preparing to manage the laws and regulations in every field. "I have the ideal of helping people make judicial proceedings, contracts, and bonds, and anything where they need the recognition of signatures and legal value..." he says. His dream is to finish his career and work in a law firm. He wishes to buy books and pay for any necessary materials to begin his studies smoothly. This is the first sequence of loans with the institution and his first year of studies at the university.

It is for these reasons that Omar requests a loan to buy books, pay for photocopies, and begin his first year of college smoothly.

loans.use: to buy books, pay for photocopies and start his first year of university smoothly.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 41 years old and a married woman with five children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.  

Alma has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Alma has been in this business for five years.

Alma requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

In the future, Alma would like to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

loans.name: Fe Felicita

texts.es:
Fe Felicita tiene 55 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su menor hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural donde su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia tienen una tienda donde ofrecen productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, entre otros, tiene buena clientela quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella, por lo que ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de frutas, verduras y golosinas para hacer crecer más su negocio y de esta manera tener mayores ingresos para su familia y mejor su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fe Felicita is 55 years old. She lives with her husband and her young son in the district of Oyotún, a rural zone where the locals work in agriculture, commerce and raising cattle. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the North Coast of Peru.


Together with her family she has a store where she offers basic food items like rice, sugar, oil amongst others. She has a good clientele who offer her good personal and work references. She has requested a loan to buy fruit, vegetables and sweets to expand her business more and in this way have more income for her family and improve their quality of living.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables and sweets to expand her business more.

loans.name: Amor Mia

texts.en:
Amor Mia works hard to support her family. 

Amor Mia is married and has a corn farming business in the Philippines. Amor Mia has been in this business for one year now.

Amor Mia requested a PHP 8,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

She would like to save enough to buy more farm lands.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Rosa Haydee

texts.es:
Rosa de 37 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de nivel académico, se dedicó al trabajo de sastrería y por esa razón ya no siguió con sus estudios, ella esta soltera no tiene pareja ya que su ex compañero  de vida formó otra  familia fuera del  país;  es así como  ella solo  vive con sus tres hijos  y sus dos  suegros, dos de sus hijos   estudian, el mayor trabaja y estudia también.
 

Rosa es cosmetóloga, ella trabaja en este oficio desde hace 9 años, lo aprendió yendo a cursos  sobre este oficio,
decidió dedicarse al  negocio  porque es una forma que le genera más ingresos para su casa,  antes  tenía otro negocio  que  era el de sastrería. El trabajo de cosmetología le queda 1 kilómetro de su casa y viaja caminado, trabaja sola y el horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.  
       
Ella utilizará el préstamo para comprar tintes de cabello, shampoo, cremas, perfumes, pintura para uñas, entre otros productos para su negocio, de manera que le  servirá para  mejorarlo  y llamar la atención de sus clientes.

Sus sueños son que su negocio crezca, que su hija le ayude en el trabajo y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa is 37 years old and studied up to Grade 9. She works as a seamstress and for this reason she does not pursue her studies. She is single and has no partner as her ex partner formed another family outside of the country. So she lives with her 3 children and her two in-laws.Two of the children study and one works and studies too.

Rosa is a cosmetologist. She has been doing this work for 9 years and she learned the trade by taking courses. She decided to work in this business since it is a way to generate more income for her household. Previously she had worked as a seamstress. Her work as a beautician is one km from her house and she gets there walking. She works alone and her hours of work are from 7 am until 5 pm.

She will use the loan to buy hair dyes, shampoo, creams, perfume, nail polish amongst other products for her store. Doing this will help her serve her clients better and get their attention. Her dream is for her business to grow, that her daughter helps her in the business and that her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy hair dyes, shampoo, creams, perfume, nail polish amongst other products for her business.

loans.name: Erli

texts.en:
Erli lives in Cibubur, located about one hour's drive from Jakarta, the capital city. She lives there with her husband and her three children (one son and two daughters). Erli owns a stall where she sells daily consumer products and provides mobile payment services for her community. She joined Ruma in 2013 and this is the second time she is applying for a loan from Kiva. She wanted to help her husband improve their life. A previous loan from Kiva helped her to improve her small business and she thanks all of the lenders because of it. 

As the business grows, Erli is hoping to get more working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. Your loan will be very useful to help Erli improve her business and accordingly, her community, which needs access to such services. 

In the photo, Erli is in her own stall. She will be thankful for your endless support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for her community.

loans.name: Sin

texts.en:
Sin is 65 years old and married. She lives in a rural area of the Phnom Srouch district of Kampong Speu province. 

To make a living, she and her husband have been farming rice and raising cows for more than 10 years. The current business earns her about 26,000 KHR per day. 

Sin has been with VisionFund for four cycles. Now she is applying for a loan to buy rice seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield so as to make a living better.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds for her farmland.

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
A $1,500 loan is offered to Rosa to improve her business. Rosa lives in Ermera and she is a business woman. Most of her daily income is from her store, so she is happy to do her business. 

She opened her business in 2004 with her own working capital of $1,000. She plans to add money to her principal amount to buy additional supplies to keep in her kiosk such as noodles, sugar, cooking oils, seasoning, cigarettes, pens, candles and other things to sell Including soft drinks and hard drinks.

This has become her activity, so she is happy to do her work every day. She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more goods. And she hopes to manage her business well with this loan.

loans.use: To buy noodles, sugar, cooking oils, seasoning, cigarettes, pens, candles and other things to sell Including soft drinks and hard drinks.

loans.name: Eri

texts.en:
Eri lives in Cibubur, located about one hour's drive from Jakarta, the capital city. 

He owns a stall where he provides mobile phone repair and mobile payment services for his community. He joined Ruma in 2013. He feels happy and satisfied with Ruma's services and he told us as well that Ruma's sales executive is really helpful and informative. Being a Ruma's agent makes him want to learn more about how to improve and maintain a business.

As the business grows, Eri is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to his community, especially on weekends. 

Your loan will be very useful to help Eri improve his business and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services. As seen in the photo, Eri is standing in his own small stall. He will be thankful for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for his community.

loans.name: Raquelina

texts.es:
Raquelina de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado de nivel académico, está acompañada el esposo trabaja de albañil. En esta relación Raquelina ha procreado 3 hijos, dos de ellos están en la escuela, con Raquelina solo vive el esposo y los hijos los cuales solo ellos dependen de ella

Raquelina tiene un negocio de calzado en frente del mercado, este negocio lo tiene desde hace  un año este oficio se lo enseñó una amiga que se dedica a lo mismo; ella viaja en bus en una distancia de 30 minutos, pero también hoy ha puesto un negocio de tortillas en la calle principal que conduce a la ciudad y este último le queda a una distancia de 5minutos de donde ella vive.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar tres sacos de maíz y comprar leña para la elaboración de tortillas, de esta forma podrá dar abasto para cubrir la demanda de clientes en su negocio.

Sus sueños son poder seguir con su negocio pues con la bendición de Dios le está yendo muy bien y además es su medio de subsistencia para mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Raquelina is 27 years old and and has a ninth grade education. She is married and her husband is a bricklayer. From this relationship, Raquelina has 3 children. Two of them are in school. Raquelina lives with just her husband and her children, and they are her only dependents.  

Raquelina has a shoe selling business across from the market. She has had this business for a year. A friend taught it to her. She travels 30 minutes in bus. However, today she has also opened a tortilla business on the main street that goes into town, and that is 5 minutes from where she lives.

She needs this loan to buy three bags of corn and firewood to make the tortillas. This way she can get the materials she needs to cover her customers' demand in her business. 

Her dream is to be able to continue in her business. With God's blessing, it is going very well for her and this is the way to subsists to support her family.

loans.use: to buy three bags of corn and firewood to make tortillas.

loans.name: Gulmera

texts.ru: Это женщина Гулмера. Она проживает в районе Спитамен вместе семьей. Гулмера шустрая и гостеприимная и приятная в общение женщина. У нее трое детей в возрасте 14, 10 и 6 лет. Гулмера занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. Она продвигает эту деятельностью более 20 лет. Гулмера обратилась за кредитом, чтобы отремонтировать дом. На счет заемных средств намерена приобрести стройматериалы. Она много лет жила в старом доме и несколько лет копила деньги на ремонт. Она была очень расстроена, признав, что ее денег не хватит для завершения ремонта и для нее единственный выход получения кредита.
texts.en: This woman is Gulmera. She lives in the Spitamen district with her family. She is a bright and welcoming woman who is pleasant to talk to. She has three children, ages 6, 10 and 14. Gulmera is a seamstress and takes custom orders. She has been in the business for over 20 years. Gulmera requested a loan in order to renovate her house and intends to use it to purchase building materials. She has lived in an old house for a long time and has been saving money for years for repairs. She was very upset knowing that she did not have enough money to complete the renovation and that the only way was for her to take out a loan.

loans.use: to buy building materials and renovate her house

loans.name: Hugo Eduardo

texts.es:
Hugo es un hombre de 29 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de contaduría pública.
Sus estudios los desarrolla en un instituto técnico situado en el centro de la ciudad, caracterizado por existir universidades, edificios de oficinas, empresas de todo tipo y comercios en todos los niveles, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 2-14 grados centígrados.
Hugo es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, baja estatura, su lengua materna es el aymará que ya no práctica porque estudia inglés, y solamente habla español como todos sus compañeros de clases. Su vida la realiza junto a sus padres y hermanos, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Él estudia la carrera de contaduría pública en un instituto técnico y cursa el 3 año de 5 que dura la carrera. “ya estoy terminando mi carrera, tuve muchos tropiezos y contratiempos, sobre todo por la falta de una computadora…” comenta. Su sueño es trabajar en su rubro en un banco y demostrar lo que aprendio, él desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil para terminar su carrera y dedicarse a trabajar. Esta es la 1 secuencia de pr[estamos con la institución en 3 años que estudia la carrera de contaduría.
Es por esos motivos queHugo solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil y terminar su carrera profesional para poder trabajar.
texts.en:
Hugo is 29 years old, single with no children. He is studying Public accounting. He does his studies at a technical Institute in the center of the city that has universities, business offices, companies of all kinds and business at every level. The climate is cold and dry with a temperature that varies during the day between 2 and 14 degrees Celsius.

Hugo is dark-skinned with short black hair, dark eyes, thin and low in stature. His native language is Aymara which he doesn't use as he is studying English and only speaks Spanish as is the case with his classmates. He lives his life with his parents and siblings. They live in a brick house with a metal roof that has potable water, electricity, cooking gas and sewage system.

He is studying Public Accounting in a technical institute and is in the 3rd year of a 5 year course. "I am finishing my studies. I have had many set-backs and mishaps for more than anything from the lack of a computer" he commented.

His dream is to work in his field in a bank and demonstrate what he has learned. He wants to make the purchase of a laptop to complete his studies and dedicate himself to work. This is his first loan with the institute in the 3 years he has been studying Accounting. It is for these reasons that Hugo is requesting a loan to buy a laptop and finish his professional training to be able to work.

loans.use: to buy a laptop and finish his professional training to be able to work.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a married woman with seven children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Teresita is 48 years old, and two of her children are in school.

Teresita has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Teresita requested a 5,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

Teresita has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Teresita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan de 45 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, por todos los sacrificios en los que incurría estudiar, cuestiones económicas  y necesidades en el hogar no pudo continuar, por lo que se dedicó a trabajar, también estuvo en el extranjero, luego regresó al país para quedarse a trabajar, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres de la casa, es padre de cuatro hijos todos menores de edad los cuales 3 están en la escuela y una en bachillerato. 


Él es motorista, cobrador y dueño de una ruta de pickup que se conducen de una ciudad a otra, a él le llamaba a atención la administración del dinero por lo que a la mínima oportunidad se fue involucrando a aprender y decidió adquirir un crédito para la compra de la unidad la que es su fuente de ingresos principal,  tiene más de 4 años de dedicarse a la actividad, el lugar de trabajo le queda a 1 kilómetro para lo cual se va en carro, el horario de trabajo es de 5:00 am a 4:00 pm.


El préstamo será invertido para pagar una deuda que adquirió en un momento de necesidad, por lo que hoy va a cancelar y empezará a pagar de forma parcial. 

Su sueño es darle lo necesario a su familia, por lo que espera trabajar siempre mientras Dios le regale salud y vida.
texts.en:
Juan, age 45, went to school through the ninth grade.  Due to all of the sacrifices that he would incur by going to school, financial questions, and need in his household, he was not able to continue going to school.  Therefore, he decided to work.  He was also abroad, and he later returned to the country in order to stay and work.  His wife devotes herself to the household chores.  He has four minor children.  Three of them are in elementary school, and one is in high school.

He is a driver, fare collector, and owner of a pickup route that goes from one city to another.  Money management caught his attention, and at the earliest opportunity he was involved in learning.  He decided to get a loan to buy the vehicle that is his main source of income.  He has been involved in this business activity for over four years.  His work place is one kilometer away, so he gets there by car.  His work schedule is from 5:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m.

He will use the loan to pay off a debt that he got at a time of need.  He will now repay it, and he will start with partial payment.

His dream is to give his family what it needs.  He hopes to always work as long as God gifts him with good health and life.

loans.use: to pay off a debt that he got at a time of need.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
Manuel, cultiva granos básicos y práctica la crianza de ganado y cerdos, con ello genera ingresos para mantener a su familia y cubrir otros compromisos de su negocio, para realizar su trabajo se requiere de empeño, tiempo y experiencia, lo tomo como herencia de sus padres y trabaja de manera independiente desde hace más de 11 años, su familia está formada por su esposa y tres hijos con edades de 13, 11 y 2 años, todo la familia trabaja para mantener el negocio funcionando y eso le da la ventaja de no pagar mozos.
Necesita de un préstamo para comprar concentrado para alimentar el ganado y pagar los costos de la recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos, la inversión le ayudara para tener un negocio estable y más rentable, así la familia tendrá un mejor estilo de vida y cancelara sus deudas.
Sus sueños son mantenerse trabajando para conservar su fuente de ingresos, que le permitan dar a su familia un mejor desarrollo en la sociedad.
texts.en:
Manuel grows basic grains and raises cattle and pigs.  With this, he generates income to support his family and cover other commitments of his business. To do this work he needs hard work, time and experience. He inherited it from his parents and he has worked independently for more than 11 years. His family is made up of his wife and three children, aged 13, 11 and 2. The whole family works in order to maintain the business and the advantage is he doesn't have to pay laborers.  

He needs a loan to buy concentrate to feed the cattle and to pay for the harvest of basic grains. The investment will help him to have a stable and more profitable business. This way, the family will have a better standard of living and will pay off its debts. 

His dream is to keep working to preserve his source of income, which will allow him to give his family better development in society.

loans.use: to buy concentrate to feed the cattle and to pay for harvesting the basic grains.

loans.name: Amadeo

texts.es:
Amadeo, se dedica a comercializar madera en la zona donde vive, está acompañado, vive con su pareja y dos nietos, toda la familia depende de las ganancias que genera el negocio, tiene una experiencia de 20 años que respalda la buena administración de su negocio, además cultiva granos básicos para tener alimento para la familia y obtener otros ingresos.
Invertirá en madera, tendrá la materia prima para atender mejor a sus clientes y estabilizar sus ingresos, pretende ahorrar en la compra al mayoreo ya que así tiene la oportunidad de ofertarla en el mercado a precios accesibles y con un buen margen de ganancias.
Amadeo aspira continuar trabajando para para cumplir con la responsabilidad de salir adelante con su familia y resarcir su deuda.
texts.en:
Amadeo sells lumber in the area where he lives. He is married and lives with his spouse and two grandchildren. The whole family depends on the income he generates from his business. He has 20 years' experience which supports the good management of his business. In addition, he grows basic grains to be able to feed his family and obtain more income. 

He will invest in lumber and have the raw materials to better serve his customers and stabilize his income. He intends on saving by buying wholesale, since this way he will have the opportunity to sell it in the market at accessible prices with a good profit margin. 

Amadeo aspires to continuing with his work so he can fulfill his responsibility to get ahead with his family and pay off his debt.

loans.use: to invest in lumber, and have the raw materials to better serve his customers and stabilize his income.

loans.name: Da

texts.en:
A resident from a rural village of the Phnom Srouch district, Da is a 46-year-old mother of two children. The main sources of the family’s income are from rice farming and pig raising, both of which she has been in for 10 years. With her current business, she can earn about KHR 30,000 per day to spend for daily expenses. 

This is the seventh loan for Da with VisionFund. She successfully paid back the loan with VisionFund. She is now requesting a loan to buy more pigs to raise, and will use a portion of it to spend on labor fees in plowing the fields. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income so as to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more pigs to raise

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Jovelyn

texts.en:
Jovelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Jovelyn is 25 years old now.

Jovelyn has a buying and selling of charcoal business in the Philippines. Jovelyn requested a 6,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy charcoal to sell in her business.

Jovelyn has been in this business for one year. In the future, Jovelyn would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy charcoal to sell in her business

loans.name: Phea

texts.en:
Living in a thatched roof house in a rural village of the Phnom Srouch district of Kampong Speu province, Phea is aged 48 years and married. She and her husband earn a living through farming rice; they have been in this business for almost 30 years. With her current business, she is able to earn approximately 30,000 KHR per day to support her family. 

This is the fifth loan for Phea with Kiva’s partner VisionFund. Now she is requesting a loan with VisionFund of 2,000,000 KHR to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more crop yield and sell it for a good price so as to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Concepcion is 65 years old now.

Concepcion has a food-vending business in the Philippines. Concepcion requested a 13,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food-production business.

Concepcion has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, Concepcion would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food-production business

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Melanie is 40 years old, and four of her children are currently in school.

Melanie has a buying and selling of ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines. Melanie requested a 50,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional stock of ready-to-wear to sell, like pants, shorts, T-shirts, shirts, slippers, etc.

Melanie has been in this business for 10 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell, like pants, shorts, T-shirts, shirts, slippers, etc

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, utilizo el crédito anterior para comprar ingredientes importantes para elaborar la venta de pan, su negocio está creciendo y cuenta con nuevas ventas, su familia se encuentra en perfectas condiciones.
Nuevamente solicita un financiamiento para comprar harina, aceite, trigo, manteca, azúcar y otros materiales que son de utilidad para elaborar el pan que ofrece a sus clientes, se siente satisfecho por el buen servicio que le ofrece Padecomsm y el apoyo que le brindan los inversionistas kiva.
texts.en:
Juan used the previous loan to buy important ingredients for his bakery business. His business is growing and his sales have increased. His family is fine.

He is again requesting a loan to buy flour, oil, wheat, butter, sugar, and other ingredients he needs to make bread and sell it to his customers. He appreciates the good service provided by PADECOMSM and the support he receives from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, wheat, butter, sugar, and other ingredients to make bread.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Maricel is 33 years old, and both children are still in school.

Maricel has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. Maricel requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell to her customers.

Maricel has been in this business for 16 years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Azucena Rosibel

texts.es:
Azucena de 30 años de edad, estudió hasta el séptimo grado no pudo seguir por no tener los recursos necesarios, se casó y tiene dos hijos menores de edad, ambos viven con ella y su esposo quien trabaja en una ONG.

Azucena se dedica a la cosmetología en la cual ya tiene más de cuatro años dedicándose a este oficio, ella estudió en una academia de cosmetología ya que es algo que siempre le ha gustado, el trabajo lo realiza a domicilio ya que no tiene un lugar fijo donde pueda trabajar así que tiene que caminar para poder llegar donde sus clientes.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar pintura para uñas y cabello, maquillaje, secador de cabello, plancha para cabello, etc. Ya que con esto podrá dar un mayor número de servicios y poder tener una mayor cantidad de clientes. 

Azucena quiere poner un local propio en la ciudad en donde pueda atender a más clientes, además desea cumplir el sueño de ver a sus hijos estudiar en la universidad.
texts.en:
Azucena is 30 years old and studied up to Grade 7. She couldn't continue her studies for lack of the necessary resources. She is married and has two young children. Both live with her and her husband who works for an NGO.

Azucena works as a cosmetologist where she has more than four years experience. She studied in a cosmetology institute as it was always something she liked. She does her work in houses as she has no set place where she can work so she has to walk to be able to get to her clients. She needs a loan to buy nail polish, hair dyes, make-up, a hair dryer, a hair straightener, etc.

Doing this she will be able to provide a greater number of services and be able to have a greater number of clients. Azucena wants to open her own shop in the city where she can attend to more clients as well as fulfilling the dream of seeing her children study at university.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, hair dye, make-up, a hair dryer, a hair straightener, etc.

loans.name: Vath

texts.en:
Vath, 39, lives in a rural area of the Phnom Srouch district of Kampong Speu province, and she is married with two children. The family’s main sources of income are from planting rice and working as garment workers. To supplement the income, she also raises pigs. She has been in this business for several years. 

Vath has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles and completely paid back the loan, which has helped her relieve the family burden and improve her likelihood. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland and buy more piglets for raising. With this loan, she hopes to make more income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Yolanda De Los Ángeles

texts.es:
Yolanda de 42 años de edad, estudió hasta 3° grado está acompañada y tiene tres hijos pero ya ninguno vive con ella, el padre de sus hijos murió y años después ella decidió formar un hogar con su pareja actual.


      Yolanda se dedica a la agricultura, donde vive es zona agrícola de maíz y frijol, 
el trabajo lo aprendió de sus padres desde muy pequeña y debe caminar dos cuadras para llegar al lugar donde siembra.


Ella necesita el crédito para comprar madera y lámina para la construcción de su vivienda, pues donde habita actualmente no es de ella.

Ella anhela ver construida su casa propia y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda del crédito.
texts.en:
Yolanda, 42, studied up to the third grade. She is in a relationship and has three children, although none of them live with her. Some years after her children’s father died, she decided to start a home with her current partner.

Yolanda works in agriculture. Locals grow corn and beans. She learned this activity when she was a little girl, from her parents. She has to walk two blocks to go to work.

Yolanda needs the loan to buy wood and metal sheets to build her own house, since the one where she lives now is not hers. Her dream is to build her own house and she knows she can make it come true with the help of this loan.

loans.use: to buy wood and metal sheets to build her house.

loans.name: Deb

texts.en:
Deb is aged 56 and married with no kids. She lives in a rural village of the Ksach Kandal district of Kampong Speu province. To make a living, she has been selling grocery items and farming rice for 10 years. 

Deb has been with VisionFund for five loan cycles. She has used the loans successfully to better support her family. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sor

texts.en:
A married mother of seven children, Sor is aged 60 and living in a rural village of the Ksach Kandal district, Cambodia. To support her family, she and her husband have been selling grocery items and farming rice as the main sources of family’s income; they have been in this business for more than 20 years. 

Sor has been with VisionFund for five loan cycles. She completely paid back the loan, which has helped her relieve the family’s burden. Sor is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s income to make a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sok Oern

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Phnom Srouch district of Cambodia, Sok Oern is aged 33 years and married with two children. She and her husband are hard-working farmers who earn a living through farming rice. To gain more income to better support the family, they work as garment workers. She and her husband have been in this business for several years. 

Sok Oern has been with Kiva’s partner VisionFund for three loan cycles and successfully paid back the past loans with VisionFund. The loans from VisionFund have helped her family relieve the family’s burdens. Now she is asking for another loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland, and will use a portion of it to spend on buying a motorcycle for commuting to work. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

location.town: Kampong Speu Province, Phnom Srouch District

loans.name: Dilbar

texts.en:
Dilbar is a confident person. She was born in 1971. She is living in a remote district. She is married. She has one child. Her husband works in the government. She worked in government, but after the birth of her child, she left that job. 

Dilbar has her own business. She is a seller at a central market. She is buying and selling kids' wear. She has a place of activity. Dilbar likes her business. She is a responsible, bright and thrifty person. 

She has requested 3,000 TJS to buy an assortment of clothes for kids.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothes for kids

loans.name: Pov

texts.en:
Pov, 53, lives in a small community of Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small farmland that is located near her house. On her farmland, she grows rice and sells her agricultural product to the local dealers. On average, she can generate an earning of USD $4.00 per day.

She is a lovely mother of four children, and she also has many grandchildren. She wants to prepare a birthday party for her lovely grandchild, but she is lacking money to afford it. Thus, she is applying for a Kiva loan to pay for her grandchild’s birthday party. 

She is thankful to all the lenders for their financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for her grandchild’s birthday party

loans.name: Davy

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Ksach Kandal district of Kandal province, Davy is a 38-year-old mother of three children. Rice planting has been the only source for her family’s income to make a living for 10 years. The current business earns her about 18,000 KHR per day. 

Davy has been with VisionFund for seven loan cycles. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers for her farmland, and will use a portion of it to spend on labor. She hopes to increase her crop yields so as to make a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 27 years old, married, and has three children, two of whom attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. She sell rice grains in the Philippines, which she has been doing for six years.

Marilyn requested a loan from NWTF for 29,500 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional stocks of rice grains to sell. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of rice grains to sell

loans.name: Toktobubu

texts.ru: Токтобубу 54 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитали 5 детей. У Токтобубу среднее образование, она на пенсии, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи много лет занимается полеводством и животноводством. Токтобубу благодаря своему упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Токтобубу, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 6 коров, 80 овец, 25 коз. Она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота для увеличения поголовья. Токтобубу намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en: Toktobubu is 54, married, and raised five children with her spouse. She has a secondary education and is retired. She has been planting crops and raising livestock for many years as the main source of income for her family. Thanks to Toktobubu's perseverance, determination and hard work, she currently has six cows, 80 sheep and 25 goats. She applied for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock and increase the size of her herd. Toktobubu intends to expand her business, which will inevitably lead to an increase in capital for her family.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and increase the size of her herd

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama is studying in Zarqa`a university majoring Management information system. After he succeed in high school was not able to Osama from entering public university because his little rate, therefore he decided to work alongside his studies so that he can be entering in one of the private universities and pay for his education.
Lately his family faced some financial problems, Osama had to help them and give them his semester fees due to his sense of responsibility towards his family. Because of that he had to apply for an education loan to cover the semester fees

loans.use: To pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Anicette

texts.fr: Agée de 50 ans, Anicette est une femme mariée qui vit seule à Nyékonakpoè. Pour favoriser son épanouissement, Anicette vend de la bouillie préparée à base du maïs dans son quartier. Anicette réalise son gain grâce à cette activité pour subvenir à ses charges. Anicette s’approvisionne au marché de Hanoukopé une fois par mois. Pour acheter le sac de maïs, Anicette demande ce fonds pour favoriser sa commande et réaliser une marge bénéficiaire qui l’aidera à mieux se nourrir.
texts.en:
Fifty years old, Anicette is a married woman who lives alone in Nyékonakpoè. In order to finance her ongoing needs, Anicette sells soup prepared from corn in her neighbourhood. She makes a profit from this activity in order to meet her expenses.

Anicette buys her supplies once a month from the market in Hanoukopé. In order to buy a sack of corn, she is requesting these funds so she can place the order and make a profit, which will help her to feed herself better.

loans.use: to purchase 12 tubs of corn and 11 tubs of sugar.

loans.name: Ayawavi

texts.fr: Ayawavi est âgée de 39 ans et est une femme mariée qui vit avec ses deux enfants dans le quartier de Kakaveli. Ayawavi vend de la boule d’Akassa préparée à base du maïs  en parcourant tout le quartier pour répondre aux besoins de ses consommateurs. Ayawavi achète ses provisions trois fois par mois au marché d’Agbélouhouin. Pour lancer une commande de sacs de maïs et des ingrédients pour sa préparation, Ayawavi nécessite ce fonds pour financer son approvisionnement.
texts.en:
Ayawavi is 39 years old and a married woman, who lives with her two children in the Kakaveli district. Ayawavi sells bowls of Akassa (a thick cornmeal porridge) prepared from corn, and she covers the entire neighbourhood to meet the demand from her consumers. 
Ayawavi buys her supplies three times a month at the market in Agbélouhouin. In order to place an order for sacks of corn and other ingredients, she needs the funds from this loan.

loans.use: to purchase three bags of corn  and one kilo of calf's trotters.

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.en:
Sharofat is polite woman. She is living in a remote district. She has a business in a domestic market. 

Her standard of living is not good, and she tries to work hard and help make a better standard of living. She is a seller. She is selling vegetables at the domestic market. 

Sharofat has a dream to educate her son at university. She needs financial help to pay the tuition fee of her son. She is asking for financial support to pay the tuition fee of the university. Sharofat awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay the tuition fee of the university for her son

loans.name: Andres De Jesus

texts.es:
Andrés, se encuentra en la planificación de la próxima siembra, por lo que se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, herbicidas, insecticidas y pagar el alquiler del terreno en el que trabaja.
Con el préstamo anterior ha tenido un cambio positivo en sus cultivos, cuenta que pudo obtener la cosecha del 75% del área  cultivada, a pesar que no tuvo el resultado esperado ha sido responsable con el pago de la deuda y con los compromisos familiares.
texts.en:
Andrés is getting ready for the new sowing season, which is why he is requesting a new loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and insecticide, and pay the rent of the land he works.

With the previous loan, his plantations improved. He says that he could harvest 75% of what he sowed. Although he did not get the results he expected, he has paid the installments on time and has fulfilled all his family duties.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and insecticide, and pay the rent of the land he works.

loans.name: Bamename

texts.fr: Bamename est une femme mariée âgée de 36 ans. Avec ses trois enfants, Bamename vit à Tokoin pour entreprendre ses activités. Pour répondre aux besoins de sa famille, Bamename a monté une petite étagère à son domicile pour vendre des produits d’alimentations générales. Bamename s’approvisionne trois fois par mois au marché. Dans le souci d’avoir un nouveau stock, Bamename sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des tomates et produits qu’elle vend pour faire une bonne rentabilité.
texts.en:
Bamename is a 36 year old married woman. She lives with her children in Tokoin, where she has her small business. In order to cover the family's expenses, Bamename has erected a small stall at her home where she sells general groceries. 
She buys her supplies three times a month at the market. As she needs to obtain new supplies, Bamename is requesting this loan in order to buy tomatoes, and other products which she resells to generate a good profit.

loans.use: to purchase tins of tomatoes, packets of spaghetti and a can of oil.

loans.name: Issah

texts.fr: Issah est un homme marié et vit à Nyékonakpoè avec sa famille. Il est âgé de 39 ans. Pour faire face aux besoins quotidiens en tant que chef de famille, Issah vend des pagnes et coud des tissus en habit selon le goût de ses clients. Issah s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé pour avoir ses tissus et ses outils de travail. Issah demande ce microcrédit pour acheter des tissus de pagne afin de coudre des habits qui seront destinés à la vente et réaliser un bénéfice pour soutenir sa famille.
texts.en:
Issah is a married man and lives in Nyékonakpoè with this family. He is 39 years old. In order to meet his day to day responsibilities as head of the family, Issah sells 'pagnes' (traditional dress robes) and he makes customised dresses from cloth, to meet the wishes of his customers. Issah buys his supplies twice a month from the Grand Marché in Lomé, in order to have fabric and the necessary tools.
Issah is requesting this micro-loan to buy pagne fabric, so he can make dresses destined for sale at a profit, to be able to support his family.

loans.use: to buy eight traditional pieces of cloth.

loans.name: Nen

texts.en:
Nen is 47 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in a rural village of the Preh Vihea province. Her family’s income derives from leasing a rice paddy and raising pigs, which she has been doing for several years. She earns about 18,000 KHR per day.
 
Nen requested her third loan from VisionFund, which she will use to buy fertilizers for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Aged 42 years old, Sokhom is a rural villager from the Ksach Kandal district earning a living through planting rice and selling grocery items as her main sources of family income. She has been in this business for 20 years. She has one kid. The current business earns her about 15,000 KHR per day.

Sokhom has been with VisionFund for five loan cycles. Now she is asking for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield and sell it for a good price to make a better life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Guy

texts.fr: Agé de 45 ans, Guy est homme marié qui vit avec sa femme et ses quatre enfants à Nyékonakpoè. Guy est un tailleur et prépare les habits cousus en pagne pour vendre à ses clients afin d’avoir un revenu disponible. Guy s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé. Pour coudre des modèles de tenues désirées par ses clients, Guy demande ce fonds pour l’aider à acheter les pagnes et les outils intervenant dans son activité. Guy compte avoir le gain nécessaire pour aider sa famille.
texts.en:
45 years old, Guy is a married man who lives with his wife and four children in Nyékonakpoè.
