Her loan request was rejected each time, because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions. According to Credo estimations the family belongs to the vulnerable poor category. Asmati has requested a Credo loan for the start-up her own business. Her loan request was approved in the frames of a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions for the country's rural poor, who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. Asmati plans to renovate the place for ritual hall and generate income from this activity. Her business will be used by local people for wedding days, christenings and other celebrations. Asmati will be able to generate significant income for her family and make better living conditions as well. She awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: To renovate the ritual hall and get income from this business

loans.name: Sajida Kousar

texts.en: Sajida Kousar is a 50-year-old woman, and mother of 3 sons. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been running a food stall, he sells different types of food such as samosa, vegetable rolls, chicken tikka, and Kabab paratha. He is responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household. Sajida Kousar's husband needs to purchase different types of food items for his business so that he can increase the size of his business, improve his sales growth and earn the maximum profit. But due to an unfavorable financial position he is not able to purchase these items for his business. Therefore Sajida Kousar has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can help her husband to purchase the items for his business. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase different types of food items for her husband's business

loans.name: Naheed Bibi

texts.en:
Naheed bibi is a 35-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her two sons and two daughters. Her children are doing their studies. Her husband has been running his own business selling clothes for five years. He is the only one responsible for feeding the entire family and managing the household. He needs to purchase different types of clothes in bulk for reselling purposes, but due to insufficient financial means he is unable to purchase these clothes. Therefore, Naheed bibi is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan so that she can assist her husband to purchase these clothes in bulk for his business. He can also increase the size of his business and earn the maximum profit with the help of this loan amount. 

Naheed bibi is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to increase her husband's clothes business

loans.name: Milagros

texts.en:
This is Milagros, age 32, resident of Coron Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Alvin and they have children. She manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Milagros operates a poultry supply store where she sells different supplies mostly for cocks. She sells it by the kilo and her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a loan of Php 11,000. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more feeds and other supplies needed to expand her product inventory. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Milagros hopes to grow her business and dreams of being able to give her family a good future through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To buy additional stocks of feeds needed to expand her product inventory.

loans.name: Zahida Kausar

texts.en:
Zahida Kausar is a responsible mother of one daughter living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan.  For 10 years her husband has been providing transportation driving a taxi.  He is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family.  He needs to make repairs to his taxi because its current condition is poor and requires additional maintenance on a daily basis.  Due to insufficient financial means he is unable to make the necessary repairs to his taxi.  Therefore Zahida Kausar has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan Zahida Kausar's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transportation services to earn a profitable income.  She also plans to save some of the profit from her husband's income to meet their family's needs in future.  She is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's taxi.

loans.name: Pacita

texts.en:
Pacita is a farmer from Ormoc, Leyte. She is married and has been in the rice-farming business for more than five years now. She also grows vegetables in her farm. 

Pacita works and supports her husband in their farming venture. 

Pacita is requesting to take a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides. A loan will help Pacita in improving the productivity of her farm, as well as her harvest and yield.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides

loans.name: Sumera Kanwal

texts.en:
Sumera Kanwal is a 28-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is the mother of 1 child. Her husband is the guardian of the family and manages the entire household. He has been running his own business as a salesman for the past 5 years.

Sumera Kanwal's husband needs to buy different commodities for the purpose of reselling, but due to financial constraints, he is unable to purchase these commodities. Therefore Sumera Kanwal has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. 

This loan will assist her husband in buying these commodities to earn maximum income. This profitable income will also help him to save to meet the needs of their family and business.

Sumera Kanwal is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband increase his sales business.

loans.name: Faten

texts.en:
Faten is a 32-year-old married lady who started her own business six years ago. Until today, she has had 13 years of experience as a hairdresser and makeup artist. She is well known in her domain for her special talents and customer services she provides to her customers. Faten attended several training sessions to keep her skills up to date to stay capable of satisfying her customers' needs and requests, and attract their attention to her newly acquired skills.

Faten has been an Al Majmoua borrower for three consecutive loans. Her currently acquired loan will be invested in increasing her business merchandise with special released spring beauty cosmetics, which will develop her business in a well-managed way. Her previously acquired loans helped her a lot in developing her working place, and she proved to be a borrower in good standing. She is working hard to open a new branch in the future, which is a dream she is working hard to make true.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special released spring beauty cosmetics

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a 27-year-old married woman living in Ormoc, Leyte. She is engaged in a hog raising business. Teresa has raised pigs for more than 4 years now, and this is her main source of living.

Teresa is asking to take a loan to buy piglets to raise and animal feed. Teresa believes that a loan will help her improve her hog raising business, thus generating more income.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise and animal feed

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a 44-year-old married woman and a mother of four children from Ormoc, Leyte.

She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than 14 years now. She also runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place.

Evangeline is asking to take a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, and additional piglets and animal feed. Evangeline believes that a loan that she will get will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda, beverages, and additional piglets and animal feed

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 34-year-old Lebanese single man living with his father and two relatives. He has been working independently since 2010. He owns a huge saw which he uses to cut hard elements into desired shapes.

Today, Youssef seeks a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. as he wants to perform needed maintenance on his saw to be able to carry on with his work properly. Youssef is positive and confident that this loan will help him meet his expectations.

loans.use: to perform needed maintenance on his saw

loans.name: Udelia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Udelia es una joven de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta 6to grado, está acompañada y su pareja es empleado de una funeraria y su cargo es ordenanza, tiene un hijo que aún no va a la escuela y viven en casa del suegro.
Udelia solamente se ha dedicado a los oficios domñesticos, por ahora ella cuida a su hijo y es su esposo quien aporta los ingresos económicos al hogar.

Ella soliicta este crédito para comprar madera y tejas para terminar de construir su casa de adobe.

Su sueño es tener un empleo para ayudar a su pareja en los gastos y terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Udelia is a young, 22 year old woman with a 6th grade education. She's in a relationship and her partner is employed at a funeral home as an office assistant. She has a son who's not attending school yet and they live in her father-in-law's house. Udelia has only worked as a housewife, and currently she takes care of her son and her husband who provides the household income. 

She's requesting this loan to purchase wood and tiles to finish building her adobe house. 

Her dream is to have a job so she can help her partner with expenses and finish building her house.

loans.use: To purchase wood and tiles to finish building her adobe house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tailoring tools and a large quantity of textiles

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es:
Juan de 37 años de edad, no culminó sus estudios de bachillerato, está casado y su esposa se dedica al comercio de queso, tiene 3 hijos, gemelas y uno de siete años.

Desde muy pequeño Juan se ha dedicado a la siembra de maíz, maicillo, pipián, sandía, también trabajó en rutas de buses pero decidió retirarse por problemas de delincuencia, además Juan se dedica a la crianza de cerdos en su casa.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar 3 cerdos y para preparar la tierra para la siembra de maíz, pipián, etc.

Sus metas son llegar a tener un carro propio con el cual pueda transportar sus productos agrícolas y así ya no alquilar carro.
texts.en:
Juan is 37 years old and didn't finish high school. He's married and his wife works selling cheese. They have 3 children, a pair of twin girls and a seven year old.

Since he was very young Juan has worked planting corn, sorghum, pipian, watermelons, and also on bus routes but decided to to leave that because of issues with crime. Additionally, Juan works in pig raising at home.

He needs the loan to purchase 3 pigs and to prepare the soil to plant corn, pipian, etc.

His goals are to have a car of his own to be able to transport his agricultural products and that way not have to rent a car.

loans.use: To purchase 3 pigs and to prepare the soil for planting corn, pipian, etc.

loans.name: Parveen Akhtar

texts.en:
Parveen Akhtar is a 50-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, and is a responsible mother of two children.

Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For the past many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly and because of this he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However, due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw.

Therefore, Parveen Akhtar has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw.

loans.use: to repair her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Samina Bibi

texts.en:
Samina Bibi is a 31-year-old woman with 3 children, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan.  For the past 10 years her husband has been running a general store and is solely responsible for fulfilling the needs of his entire family.  Samina Bibi's husband wants to purchase different kinds of commodities such as rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other consumer items for his business purposes.  But due to financial constraints he is not in a suitable position to buy all the above products for reselling purposes. 

Therefore Samina Bibi has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.  This loan will enable her husband to buy all of these commodities and also help him earn maximum profit to provide for his household and business.  Samina Bibi is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to help her husband purchase rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other consumer items to increase his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, tea bags, milk, and other consumer items to help her husband increase his business.

loans.name: María Ana Dolores

texts.es:
María de 35 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado en la escuela, actualmente está casada y tiene 4 hijos que son estudiantes.

María desde pequeña trabajó en el campo, cosechando algodón, sembrando maìz, maicillo y pipianes, cuando tuvo hijos decidió dedicarse solo a los oficios domésticos, pero desde hace 3 años se está dedicando a la crianza de cerdos y vende pupusas por las noches.

El crédito que está solicitando lo necesita para comprar 4 cerdos de engorde, una cocina nueva para hacer pupusas y para comprar insumos agrícolas.

Ella sueña con mejorar su casa y que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Maria is 35 years old and has a third grade education. Currently she's married and his 4 children that are in school.

Since she was a little girl Maria has worked in the field, picking cotton, planting corn, sorghum, and pipian. When she had children she decided to dedicate herself to just housework, but for the last 3 years she has worked raising pigs and sells pupusas at night.

She needs the loan she's requesting to purchase 4 pigs to fatten, a new kitchen to make pupusas, and to purchase agricultural supplies.

Her dream is to improve her home and for her kids to become professionals.

loans.use: To purchase 4 pigs to fatten, a new kitchen for making pupusas, and agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Universal Group

texts.en: These women are part of the group called Universal Group that is made up of four people. The members are friends and belong to the same savings group. They are into plastic items, creams, powders, spray sauce pans, and smoked fish. Gladys is the representative for the group and is 46 years old. She is married and she has children who are not dependent on her. To meet her needs, Gladys has been selling creams, powders and sprays at her residence for the past 10 years. She gets her supplies from wholesalers. To expand her business and become more competitive in this field, Gladys wishes to increase her creams, powders and sprays, which in turn will enable her to increase her turnover and income. For this reason, Gladys is requesting a sixth loan from ID-Ghana, together with other members of the Universal Group. All her previous loans have been fully repaid.

loans.use: To increase her creams, powder and sprays, which in turn will enable her to increase her turnover and income.

loans.name: Julio Aldubi

texts.es:
Julio es un joven de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta octavo grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, solamente tiene un hijo pequeño.

Julio se dedica a la agricultura, actividad que realiza desde muy pequeño y que aprendió de su padre, Julio madruga para llegar hasta donde tiene sus cultivos, además se dedica a la quiebra de piedra volcánica para luego venderlas, todas estas actividades le generan ingresos y le permiten salir adelante.

Él necesita este crédito para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde cultiva y para preparar la tierra.

Sus planes a futuro son ofrecerle lo mejor a su familia para que se sientan cómodos.
texts.en:
Julio is a 24 years old and has an eighth-grade education. He has a partner, who takes care of the household chores. The couple has a young son. 

Julio works in farming. He has been doing this since he was very young, having learned the trade from his father. Julio wakes up very early in order to go to the land where he grows his crops. Julio also works breaking up volcanic rock to sell. These two jobs provide Julio with an income and allow him to move forward in life.

Julio needs this loan in order to pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops, and to prepare that land.

Julio’s plan for the future is to offer his family the best things in life that he can so that they feel comfortable.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops, and to prepare that land.

loans.name: Marta Liliam

texts.es:
Marta tiene 55 años de edad, debido a la condición económica sus padres no pudieron darle estudios, está soltera y sus hijos ya son mayores de edad, pero ella vive en casa de uno de sus hijos junto a su nuera y nietos.

Desde muy joven, Marta se ha dedicado a trabajar, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas lo cual aprendió con su madre que se dedicaba a lo mismo, ella madruga para que a las 7 de la mañana ya esté lista su venta para los habitantes y trabajadores cercanos.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar dos vacas lecheras, ya que su hijo tiene espacio para tenerlas en el terreno y les proveerá leche.

Su sueño es tener varias vacas lecheras ya que será una fuente de ingresos para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Marta is 55 years old and, owing to her parents’ financial situation when she was a girl, could not go to school. Marta is single. Her children are now adults, although one still lives at home with his wife and children.

Since she was very young, Marta has worked selling tortillas, a trade that she learned from her mother, who did the same work. Marta wakes up at 7am so that her products are ready to sell to local inhabitants and workers.

Marta needs this loan in order to buy two dairy cows. Her son has space to keep them on his land. The cows will provide milk.

Marta’s dream is to have various dairy cows, as this would be a source of income for her and her family.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es:
José tiene 29 años de edad, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene tres hijos que son menores de edad.

José siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura y además es albañil, se levanta desde muy temprano y regresa a casa cuando ha terminado de trabajar, su esposa le ayuda en los gastos del hogar ya que elabora tortillas junto con otra señora.

José necesita el crédito para comprar las herramientas necesarias para iniciar su propio negocio de estructuras metálicas.

Él sueña con construir su casa de ladrillo pues donde vive actualmente es de lámina, además sueña con darle estudios a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 29 years old and married. His wife looks after the household chores. The couple has three children, all of whom are under the age of 18.

José has always worked in farming. He is also a builder. He wakes up very early and returns home when he has finished his work. José’s wife helps with the household expenses by producing tortillas with another woman.

José needs this loan in order to buy the necessary tools to start a business building metal structures.

José’s dream is to build a brick house as his current residence is made with metal sheeting. José also dreams of giving his children an education.

loans.use: to buy the necessary tools to start a business building metal structures.

loans.name: José Isabel

texts.es:
José cuenta con 31 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta tercer grado, está acompañado y tiene un hijo de pocos meses de edad.

José se dedica a la agricultura, además se dedica al destazo junto a su pareja, en la época de siembra José madruga para realizar dichos trabajos y el destazo lo realiza una vez a la semana.

Este crédito lo necesita para pagar el alquiler del terreno donde siembra y para comprar una vaca lechera.

Su sueño es mejorar su casa y darle lo mejor a su hijo.
texts.en:
José is 31 years old and could only attend school up to third grade. He has a partner, and a son who is just a few months old.

José works in farming, as well as slaughtering animals with his partner. In the sowing season, José wakes up very early to do his work. He slaughters animals once a week.

José needs this loan in order to pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops, and to buy a dairy cow.

José’s dream is to improve his house and to give his son the best possible life.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the land where he grows his crops, and to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Arquimides Ernesto

texts.es:
Arquímides tiene 28 años de edad, está acompañado y tiene 2 hijos, solo pudo estudiar hasta 8vo grado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Arquímides se dedica al comercio, tiene su propia tienda, esta actividad la aprendió desde muy pequeño pues su amdre se dedicaba a lo mismo, su pareja se dedica a venter antojitos, pupusas y demás productos y así colabora con los gastos del hogar.

Él solicita este préstamo para comprar útiles escolares como cuadernos para variar su negocio.

Su sueño es construir su propia casa ya que vive en casa de su madre, y espera darle lo mejor a su pareja y sus hijos.
texts.en:
Arquimides, 28, lives with his wife and two children.  He only has an eighth grade education and his wife takes care of the domestic tasks.

Arquimedes is a merchant and has his own store.  He learned the business from is mother when he was very young since she did the same thing.  His wife sells snack foods, pupusas (filled tortillas) and other products to contribute to the household economy.

He is requesting a loan to buy school supplies like notebooks to diversify his business.

His dream is to build his own house as he lives with his mother.  He wants to give his partner and children the best he can.

loans.use: To buy school supplies like notebooks for his business.

loans.name: Rosa Matilde

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora que se dedica a la confección  de ropa, desde hace más de 4 años. Ella podido comprar telas, que son la materia prima  la elaboración de manteles, camisas, fundas, vestidos, etc. Por consiguiente, pudo cumplir con todos los pedidos y a la vez,  generar más ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.  
Ella solicita un crédito para comprar telas, hilos, botones,  etc. Para completar los encargos, pues gracias a la ayuda de su hermana, ha podido hacerse responsable de la demanda que va en creciente aumento. Rosa, espera incrementar la producción y con las ganancias comprar una vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosa is a hard-working entrepreneur who has been in the sewing business for over four years.  She buys the fabric to make tablecloths, shirts, slipcovers, dresses, etc.  She has been able to fill orders and generate more income to improve her family's quality of life.

The loan she is requesting is to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, etc. to fill more orders.  Thanks to the help of her sister she has been able to take on the increasing demand.  Rosa hopes to increase production and use the profit to buy a house.

loans.use: To buy fabrics, threads, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Genoveva De La Paz

texts.es:
Genoveva de 34 años de edad, estudió hasta 8vo grado, luego se dedicó a ayudar a su madre en el trabajo está acompañada y tiene dos hijos, uno de ellos estudia y el otro aún está muy pequeño.

Genoveva se ha dedicado al comercio desde que era muy pequeña, ella compra y vende pescado, además se dedica a la venta de tortillas, su esposo se dedica a la pesca artesnal y distribuye a las vendedoras de la comunidad.

Ella necesita este préstamo para comprar pescados y verduras para comercializar.

Su sueño mas grande es darle estudios a sus hijos y tener una tienda en casa.
texts.en:
Genoveva, 34, has an eighth grade education but then she started helping her mother in her work.  She has a partner and two children, one in school and the other one too young yet.

Genoveva has worked as a merchant since she was very young.  She buys and sells fish and also sells tortillas.  Her husband is an artisan fisherman and sells to vendors in the community.

She is in need of a loan to buy fish and vegetables to sell.  Her greatest desire is to give her children an education and to set up a store in her house.

loans.use: To buy fish and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: José Gerardo

texts.es:
José tiene 62 años de edad, está acompañado, sus hijos ya no ven con él pues son mayores y tienen sus propios hogares.

José se ha dedicado a la agricultura toda su vida, pues es el oficio que le enseñaron sus padres y con el cual ha logrado ganarse la vida y criar a sus hijos.

Este crédito lo necesita para comprar una ternera ya que tiene un pasto donde cuidarla y luego poder venderla para obtener ganancias.

Él espera que sus vacas le generan ganancias con la leche y sus derivados.
texts.en:
Jose, 62, lives with his partner, and their adult children have their own homes.  Jose has worked in agriculture all his life and was taught the trade by his parents.  He has been able to earn a living this way and raise his children.

This loan is to buy a calf since he has a pasture for it.  Later he will sell it for a profit.  He hopes to make money from his cattle's milk and dairy production.

loans.use: To buy a calf.

loans.name: Sebastiao

texts.pt:
Senhor Sebastião  é casado, e pai de 7 filhos, dos quais 5 estudam frenquentando o ensino primário e secundário respectivamente, vive em casa própria com a sua familia, trabalha como padeiro e  faz criação de patos .
O montante financiado irá aplicar para compra de cimento, areia, chapas, pedras para reabilitar a sua casa visto que encontra se em péssimo estado para se habitar.
No futuro espera comprar carro,  para trabalhar de aluguer no transporte de  productos, de modo a aumentar a renda para o sustento familiar.
Liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora é o seu maior desafio para garantir mais financiamentos futuros.
texts.en: Sebastião is a married father to 7 children, 5 of whom attend either primary or secondary school. He lives in his own home with his family and he works as a baker and also raises ducks. He plans to use the requested loan to buy cement, sand, corrugated sheeting and stones to undertake some home improvement work as his dwelling is in a poor state and requires maintenance. In the future, he hopes to buy a car so that he can find work as a goods delivery driver, increasing his family income. The greatest challenge that he faces is repaying his loan without falling into arrears so that he can apply for further loans in the future.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, corrugated sheeting and stones to improve his home.

loans.name: Miguel Antonio

texts.es:
Miguel de 27 años de edad, está soltero y no tiene hijos, vive con su madre y hermanos.

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura, ya tiene 7 años realizando esta actividad pues es su principal fuente de ingresos y con lo cual ayuda en los gastos del hogar.

El crèdito solicitado lo necesita para comprar dos terneras de repasto para cuidarlas y luego venderlas.

Sus planes son seguir cultivando la tierra y sembrar tres hectáreas de maíz para aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Miguel, 27, is single and has no children.  He lives with his mother and siblings.  Miguel has worked in agriculture for seven years and it is his main source of income to help cover household expenses.

The loan he is requesting is to buy two calves to raise and sell.  He plans to continue working the land and will plant three hectares of corn to increase his income.

loans.use: To buy calves to raise and sell.

loans.name: Pascal

texts.en:
Pascal is a 42-year-old married mother of two children who has been running her small convenience store since February 2011.

She is a hard worker who supports her beloved husband in making their precious family's living and covering their increasing needs, especially their children's education.

She is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to increase her business merchandise with special winter season items that will fulfill her customers' needs and requests, and at the same time, increase her family's income.

This is her second loan as an Al Majmoua borrower where she invested her previously acquired loan to increase her business merchandise and proved to be a borrower in good standing. 

She hopes that in the future, she will be capable of expanding her business to a wider supermarket that covers almost all of her customers' needs, and  start selling fruits and vegetables as a good step forward.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with special winter season items

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a housewife. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband has been providing transport facilities by driving a taxi for six years. He is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the entire family. Her husband needs to maintain his taxi because the current condition of his taxi is not good. It requires more maintenance charges on a daily basis. Due to insufficient financial means, he is unable to maintain his taxi. Therefore, Shamim has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

With the help of this loan, Shamim's husband can afford the maintenance cost easily and provide better transport facilities to earn a profitable income. Shamim also plans to make savings with the profit from her husband's income to meet her family's needs in the future.

Shamim is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to repair her husband's car

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a 32-year-old married woman and a mother of three children from Leyte, Philippines. She runs a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. Elizabeth has been in the business for more than three years now. This is the source of her income. Elizabeth is requesting to take a loan to buy more groceries like snack foods and biscuits, canned goods, noodles, soda, dried fish and others. A loan will help Elizabeth improve her business as well as her income. In the future, Elizabeth dreams of improving her store so that it will generate more income. Moreover, she wants to save money for the schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy more groceries like snack foods and biscuits, canned goods, noodles, soda, dried fish and other items

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en: Merlyn is a 28-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Ormoc, Leyte. She owns a small sari-sari or retail store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place. She also earns an additional income through a tricycle service that her husband operates. Merlyn is asking to take a loan to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and to pay for the repair of the tricycle. In the future, Merlyn hopes to expand her business in order to generate more income. She also wants to save some of her earnings to pay for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and to pay for the repair of her tricycle

loans.name: Margarida

texts.pt:
Senhora Margarida, é solteira e mãe de 2 filhos, dos quais uma estuda frenquentando ensino secundário, vive em casa própria com os seus filhos, e depende de negócio para sobreviver.
 O montante financiado vai aplicar na compra de cimento, areia,  pedra para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa, visto que vive na mesma mas ainda está em construcao.
No futuro espera ampliar o seu negócio, visto que  e a base do sustento familiar, e terminar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora e o seu maior desejo é manter o seu bom nome na instituição.
texts.en: Margarida is a single mother to 2 children, 1 of whom currently attends secondary school. She lives with her children in their own home and she depends on her business in order to make a living. She plans to use the requested loan to buy cement, sand and stone to continue with building work on her home, which they currently live in despite it still being under construction. In the future, she hopes to expand her business in order to increase her family's income, and she also hopes to repay her loan without getting into arrears. The greatest challenge that she faces is maintaining her good reputation with the micro-finance institution.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and stone to continue with building work on her home.

loans.name: Amineh

texts.en: Amineh is a 34-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and four children.  Five years ago, after taking into consideration the family’s financial situation, she decided to start her own cultivation business. She grows her crops in a small area where she takes good care of her goods to generate tasty and top quality products. Today, she is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva's partner Vitas s.a.l to purchase agricultural supplies. Amineh tends to her hard work and looks forward to opening her own vegetable and fruit shop in the coming years.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.pt:
Senhor Eugénio é casado pai de 5 filhos dos quais 3 estudam no ensino primário e  secundário, vive em casa própria com a sua famίlia e não sustenta mais ninguém, é criador de frangos e é pedreiro.
O montante financiaciado será aplicado para a compra de pintos, rações,vacinas para criação de frangos.
No futuro pretende construir mais aviários para ampliar a criação de frangos de modo a melhorar o sustento familiar.
O seu maior desafio é de garantir o sustento familiar e escolar dos filhos dos que ainda estudam e manter o bom nome na hluvuku Adsema de forma a garantir futuros empréstimos.
texts.en: Eugénio is a married father to 5 children, 3 of whom are studying at either primary or secondary school. He lives with his family in their own home and he is not financially responsible for anyone else. Eugenio makes his living by raising chickens and he is also a brick-layer. He plans to use his loan to buy chicks, feed and vaccines for raising more chickens. In the future, he hopes to build another aviary in order to expand his chicken business and improve his family's income. The greatest challenge that he faces is ensuring that his family has enough to sustain them, to keep his children in school and to maintain the good reputation that he currently has with Hvuluku Adsema so that he can apply for further loans in the future.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed and vaccines for raising chickens.

loans.name: Aysel

texts.en:
Aysel is a divorced mother of one.  For 10 years, she was a realtor but her office was sold and she had to close her business.  In the meantime, she has been working from her home.  With this loan, she plans to rent office space and use her profit to help prepare a better future for her child.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Aysel hanım bir çocuk annesi eşinden ayrı on yıldır emlakçılık yaparak geçimini sağlamış dükkân satılınca kapatmış.  Evden network sistemi yaparak evini geçindiriyor.  Aldığı kredi ile dükkân tuttu ve emlakçılık yapıyor.  Çocuğuna iyi bir gelecek hazırlamak istiyor.

loans.use: to rent an office
